item.description: Here is hoping for good weather ..... we will have a meet up... on Sunday July 15th.... If it is raining we may change it to my house... but look for any updates on the 14th.... Please rsvp so that we know how many our coming... if you are going to bring snack or drink put that in your comments as well... so we know what we need and what we don't need..... We have a lot of new members and I am looking forward to meeting all of you and your owners too.... just a quick update on my friend Ruth, who lost Diamond last month, she has adopted two pugs from upper state NY and Shithead, her male, who has been suffering severe depression since the loss of Diamond, has taken control of his new brother and sister and is once again being the shit head he is named for...... they should be down for a visit soon.... so we may have an imprompto pug fun day.... will let you all know.. but for right now... July 15 at Matt and Lisa's.... if lost please call my cell phone 493-6005... pug hugs to all Patty

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: JULY PLAY DATE AND FUN FOR US TOO...
